name: Trapped (itch) (StallionStudios)
description:
A student game, made at the University of Utah!

Quietly creep though the shrouded halls of an abandoned hospital, inhabited by nobody - except a solitary creature which stalks you through the ruined building, a shadowy mass that follows you tirelessly and will ensure your grisly end.

Your only guide are the notes left across the hospital by its former occupants, cryptic documents that hide the hints you need to escape. Traverse the silent floors of the building, retrieve the notes, and try your best to make it out... before it's too late.
